title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 02, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 02, 2020
description:
On Today's Episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP reports that the Big Ten is targeting October 10th as a date for a return to play. Former NBA All Star and current ESPN Analyst, Mark Jackson joins us to discuss tonight's playoff matchups. We're also joined by the White Mamba, Brian Scalabrine to recap the Celtics game against the Raptors last night. Plus, Fritzy finally gets his Onion Bagel with Cream Cheese.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP reports that the Big Ten is targeting October 10th as a date for a return to play. Former NBA All Star and current ESPN Analyst, Mark Jackson joins us to discuss tonight's playoff matchups. We're also joined by the White Mamba, Brian Scalabrine to recap the Celtics game against the Raptors last night. Plus, Fritzy finally gets his Onion Bagel with Cream Cheese.
